verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w Apostle|strong="G0652"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w in|strong="G2596"\w* agreement \w with|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* saints \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* full \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w true|strong="G1922"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* harmony \w with|strong="G2316"\w* religion,

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w made|strong="G5319"\w* \w clear|strong="G5319"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* good \w news|strong="G3056"\w*, \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* order \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* became \w a|strong="G3739"\w* preacher;

\w To|strong="G2596"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \w my|strong="G2596"\w* \w true|strong="G1103"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* did \w not|strong="G2532"\w* take \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* went away \w from|strong="G2596"\w* \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* necessary \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w put|strong="G2525"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w order|strong="G2443"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w*, placing \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* authority \w over|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* churches \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w town|strong="G4172"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*;

\w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w good|strong="G1510"\w* record, \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w whose|strong="G5101"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w the|strong="G2192"\w* faith, \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w may|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* said \w that|strong="G5100"\w* \w they|strong="G2192"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* given \w to|strong="G1722"\w* loose \w living|strong="G2192"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* uncontrolled.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w necessary|strong="G1163"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* Bishop \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w man|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* virtue, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* God's servant; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* pushing himself forward, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* quickly moved \w to|strong="G1163"\w* wrath \w or|strong="G3361"\w* blows, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* desiring profit \w for|strong="G1063"\w* himself;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* opening his house freely \w to|strong="G1342"\w* guests; a lover \w of|strong="G1342"\w* \w what|strong="G0235"\w* \w is|strong="G1342"\w* \w good|strong="G5358"\w*, serious-minded, \w upright|strong="G1342"\w*, \w holy|strong="G3741"\w*, \w self-controlled|strong="G4998"\w*;

Keeping \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* true \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1322"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* give \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* right \w teaching|strong="G1322"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* overcome \w the|strong="G3588"\w* arguments \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* doubters.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w men|strong="G0506"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* ruled \w by|strong="G1537"\w* law; foolish \w talkers|strong="G3151"\w*, false teachers, specially \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*,

\w By|strong="G1210"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w some|strong="G3739"\w* \w families|strong="G3624"\w* \w have|strong="G1163"\w* \w been|strong="G3361"\w* \w completely|strong="G3650"\w* \w overturned|strong="G0396"\w*; \w who|strong="G3739"\w* take money \w for|strong="G3361"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* right; \w these|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* stopped.

\w One|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w has|strong="G5100"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w The|strong="G3004"\w* \w men|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* Crete \w are|strong="G0846"\w* ever false, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, lovers \w of|strong="G1537"\w* food, hating work.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w witness|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*. \w So|strong="G2443"\w* \w say|strong="G1223"\w* sharp words \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w come|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* right \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*,

\w Giving|strong="G4337"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w attention|strong="G4337"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fictions \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Jews \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* rules \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w true|strong="G0225"\w* knowledge.

\w To|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* heart \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* unclean \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w* faith \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*; \w they|strong="G0846"\w* become unclean \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* thought.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* say \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w while|strong="G1510"\w* \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* acts \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* turning \w their|strong="G2532"\w* backs \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*; \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* hated \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, hard-hearted, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* judged \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w* value \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.
